evidence.claim: StackIt utilizes AWS for infrastructure hosting and services.
The company complies with HIPAA standards for handling health information.
StackIt integrates EHR systems through X12 transaction sets for healthcare data exchange.
StackIt employs GCP for data analytics and processing.
StackIt uses message queuing to handle real-time data processing.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transactions or clearinghouse services found on the site.
